Title: Dipper & Mabel vs. the Future
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), Mark Rizzo (outline), Alex Hirsch (outline), Matt Chapman, Josh Weinstein, Alex Hirsch, Jeff Rowe (additional material written by)
Actors: Kristen Schaal, Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Linda Cardellini
Plot: As Dipper and Mabel's 13th birthday approaches, Ford and Dipper go on a dangerous mission.
